sqlMap.select: SELECT C.ATTR_VALUE_ID AS attrValueId , C.ATTR_VALUE_NAME AS attrValueName , C.ATTR_VALUE AS attrValue FROM PRODUCT_ATTR A , PROD_ATTR_VALUE B , ATTR_VALUE C WHERE A.PRODUCT_ATTR_ID = B.PRODUCT_ATTR_ID AND B.ATTR_VALUE_ID = C.ATTR_VALUE_ID AND A.PRODUCT_ID = #productId# AND A.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND B.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND C.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT PRODUCT_ID as productId ,PRODUCT_NBR as productNbr ,PRODUCT_NAME as productName , PRODUCT_DESC as productDesc ,PROD_FUNC_TYPE as prodFuncType ,PRODUCT_TYPE as productType ,VALUE_ADDED_FLAG as valueAddedFlag ,EFF_DATE as effDate ,EXP_DATE as expDate FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROD_OFFER P,PROD_OFFER_DISTRIBUTOR A WHERE P.PROD_OFFER_ID = A.PROD_OFFER_ID AND P.STATUS_CD = '1000'
STATUS_CD = #prodOfferStatusCd# PROD_OFFER_NAME LIKE concat('%',#prodOfferName#,'%') A.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #orgCode# P.tenant_id=#tenantId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PRODUCT P,PRODUCT_DISTRIBUTOR A WHERE P.PRODUCT_ID = A.PRODUCT_ID AND P.STATUS_CD = '1000'
P.STATUS_CD = #productStatusCd# P.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE concat('%',#productName#,'%') A.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #orgCode# P.tenant_id=#tenantId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT DISTINCT C.PRODUCT_ID , C.PRODUCT_NBR , C.PRODUCT_NAME , B.COMPOENT_TYPE , B.MIN_COUNT , B.MAX_COUNT FROM PROD_OFFER A,OFFER_PROD_REL B , PRODUCT C WHERE A.PROD_OFFER_ID = B.PROD_OFFER_ID AND B.PRODUCT_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND A.PROD_OFFER_ID = #prodOfferId# AND A.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND B.tenant_id=#tenantId# AND C.tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT PROD_OFFER_ID as prodOfferId , OFFER_NBR as offerNbr , PROD_OFFER_NAME as prodOfferName , OFFER_TYPE as offerType , PROD_OFFER_DESC as prodOfferDesc , EFF_DATE as effDate , EXP_DATE as expDate FROM PROD_OFFER WHERE PROD_OFFER_ID = #prodOfferId# AND tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT REQUEST_TEMPLATE_INST_ID requestTemplateInstId ,BATCH_NO batchNo ,NAME name , DESCRIPTION description , DEPT_CODE deptCode , CONT_NAME contName ,CONT_TELE contTele, CREATE_DATE createDate,FINISH_DATE finishDate,EXPECT_FINISH_DATE expectFinishDate,REQUEST_TYPE requestType,ACTION_TYPE actionType FROM REQUEST_INFO WHERE tenant_id=#tenantId# ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT REQUEST_OBJECT_ID requestObjectId ,REQUEST_TEMPLATE_INST_ID requestTemplateInstId ,OBJECT_TYPE objectType ,OBJECT_CODE objectCode,OBJECT_NAME objectName FROM REQUEST_OBJECT WHERE 1=1
REQUEST_TEMPLATE_INST_ID = #requestTemplateInstId# tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT A.MSG FROM INTF_LOG_CLOB A,INTF_LOG B,PROD_OFFER C,PROD_OFFER_DISTRIBUTOR D WHERE A.CONTRACT_INTERACTION_ID = B.CONTRACT_INTERACTION_ID AND A.SRC_TRAN_ID = B.SRC_TRAN_ID AND B.BUS_OBJ_ID = C.OFFER_NBR AND B.BUS_OBJ_TYPE = 'PROD_OFFER' AND C.PROD_OFFER_ID = D.PROD_OFFER_ID AND A.tenant_id=B.tenant_id AND B.tenant_id=C.tenant_id AND C.tenant_id=D.tenant_id
D.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #orgCode# B.BUS_OBJ_ID = #busObjId# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT A.MSG FROM INTF_LOG_CLOB A,INTF_LOG B,PRODUCT C,PRODUCT_DISTRIBUTOR D WHERE A.CONTRACT_INTERACTION_ID = B.CONTRACT_INTERACTION_ID AND A.SRC_TRAN_ID = B.SRC_TRAN_ID AND B.BUS_OBJ_ID = C.PRODUCT_ID AND C.PRODUCT_ID = D.PRODUCT_ID AND B.BUS_OBJ_TYPE = 'PRODUCT' AND A.tenant_id=B.tenant_id AND B.tenant_id=C.tenant_id AND C.tenant_id=D.tenant_id
D.DISTRIBUTOR_ID = #orgCode# A.tenant_id=#tenantId#
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC
